**Nintendo Switch Black Friday: Nintendo’s excellent console is one of the
most in-demand gaming devices out right now, but there’s still plenty of
worthwhile bargains available.**

## Nintendo Switch Black Friday

While we’re all waiting to see what sort of Switch bargains [Black
Friday](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/best-black-friday-
deals-2018-2952384) will bring – and you can be sure we’ll be covering that
extensively – it’s time can get a decent idea of what to expect by looking at
some of last year’s discounts.

The Nintendo Switch was one of the hottest items of Black Friday 2017, helped
by the fact that it was the newest console to hit the market. It meant that
the hardware held its price relatively well so there weren’t many out of this
world discounts to be found.

However, some great bundles did emerge including a Nintendo Switch with Super
Mario Odyssey and Mario + Rabbids for just £299.99 which, to nobody’s
surprise, sold out immediately. Now the console is a year or so old, we’ve
already seen it drop in price across multiple retailers. On Black Friday, we
expect some bombastic discounts.

It’s one of the only premiere consoles that combines the joy of mobile gaming
with proper controls, rich virtual worlds and the fidelity you’d expect from
PS4 or Xbox One.

The ability to play games anywhere, whether it’s on the bus or in a coffee
shop, is a magical thing indeed. Players will cry whenever a beloved indie
game or anticipated release isn’t coming to the platform, although they often
do.

Switch is also the most multiplayer-friendly console you can buy. Its Joy-Cons
can be detached and wielded as two separate controllers for local multiplayer,
while online play is also supported.

For more information on what to play on your Switch, check out our list of the
[Best Nintendo Switch Games](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/nintendo-
switch-games-3435122). If anything’s going to tempt you into a purchase, it’s
that.

Here are the latest and greatest deals on Switch consoles, games, accessories
and more – all available right now.

_All prices were correct at time of publication but are subject to change. Be
sure to snap them up before they’re gone._
